name: checklist-monorepo
description: Professional checklist web application with React and Node.js

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix server run build && npm --prefix client run build
scripts.typecheck: npm --prefix server run typecheck && npm --prefix client run typecheck
